title: Twisted Death
description: One gunshot is all it took for my world to crumble. For the future I had never dared to dream of to turn to dust. One gunshot is all it took to for fate to steal Cole Ryan from me. Now I’m stuck in hell and Satan himself has his eye on me. This time there is no diversion, no savior. There is only Death. I feel it breathing down my neck with the hot sticky breath of the enemy that lusts for me. I’ll surrender. I’ll sell myself. I’ll sacrifice. Whatever it takes to buy me time and the soul of my soulmate. Whatever it takes to bring light after the whole world goes dark. ****This book contains graphic sex, extreme violence, uncomfortable and dark sexual encounters as well as M/M/F, M/M and F/F sexual relationships. It's intended for mature audiences, interested in dark and twisted reads, over 18 only****
author: Ace Gray
